name: Outward Supplies
query: select tabInvoices.invoice_number as 'Invoice Number',tabInvoices.invoice_date as 'Invoice Date', DATE(tabInvoices.creation) as Date, if(tabInvoices.gst_number!='','Registered','Un-registered') as 'Type of Customer', tabInvoices.invoice_type as Type, tabItems.type as 'Item Type',if(tabItems.type="Excempted","Without Tax","Regular") as 'Type of Supply',tabInvoices.trade_name as 'Name of Client / Customer', tabInvoices.gst_number as 'Customer GSTIN / UIN', tabItems.item_value_after_gst as 'Invoice value', tabItems.item_value as 'Taxable Value', convert(tabItems.gst_rate,CHAR) as RATE, convert(tabItems.gst_rate,CHAR) as 'GST Rate', convert(tabItems.igst,CHAR) as 'IGST Rate', tabItems.igst_amount as 'IGST Amount', convert(tabItems.cgst,CHAR) as 'CGST Rate', tabItems.cgst_amount as 'CGST Amount', convert(tabItems.sgst,CHAR) as 'SGST / UT Rate', tabItems.sgst_amount as 'SGST / UT GST Amount', convert(tabItems.cess,CHAR) as 'GST Compensation Cess Rate', tabItems.cess_amount as 'GST Compensation Cess Amount',tabItems.cess_amount+tabItems.igst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.cgst_amount as 'Sum of taxes', if (tabItems.type="Included",( if ((tabItems.item_value*(tabItems.gst_rate/100)) = (tabItems.igst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.cgst_amount),"-",round((tabItems.item_value*(tabItems.gst_rate/100)),2)-round((tabItems.igst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.cgst_amount),2) )),"-") as 'Reverse Calc',  tabItems.sac_code as HSN, tabItems.item_name as 'UQC', "1" as Quantity from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent order by tabInvoices.invoice_number
